subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Suits (Apparel)
lead_paragraph: Inside the Joseph Abboud showroom in Manhattan, where Rachel Johnson, a stylist, selected clothes for Dontari Poe, an oversize defensive tackle, to wear to the draft.
snippet: Inside the Joseph Abboud showroom in Manhattan, where Rachel Johnson, a stylist, selected clothes for Dontari Poe, an oversize defensive tackle, to wear to the draft.
